00057 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00058 //  CLASS : sc_event_expr
00059 //
00060 //  The event expression class.
00061 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00062 
00063 template< typename T >
00064 class sc_event_expr
00065 {
00066     friend class sc_event;
00067     friend class sc_event_and_list;
00068     friend class sc_event_or_list;
00069 
00070     typedef T type;
00071 
00072     inline sc_event_expr()
00073        : m_expr( new T(true) )
00074     {}
00075 
00076 public:
00077 
00078     inline sc_event_expr( sc_event_expr const & e) // move semantics
00079       : m_expr(e.m_expr)
00080     {
00081         e.m_expr = 0;
00082     }
00083 
00084     T const & release() const
00085     {
00086         sc_assert( m_expr );
00087         T* expr = m_expr;
00088         m_expr=0;
00089         return *expr;
00090     }
00091 
00092     void push_back( sc_event const & e) const
00093     {
00094         sc_assert( m_expr );
00095         m_expr->push_back(e);
00096     }
00097 
00098     void push_back( type const & el) const
00099     {
00100         sc_assert( m_expr );
00101         m_expr->push_back(el);
00102     }
00103     operator T const &() const
00104     {
00105         return release();
00106     }
00107 
00108     ~sc_event_expr()
00109     {
00110         delete m_expr;
00111     }
00112 
00113 private:
00114     mutable type * m_expr;
00115 
00116     // disabled
00117     void operator=( sc_event_expr const & );
00118 };
00119

00126 class SC_API sc_event_list
00127 {
00128     friend class sc_process_b;
00129     friend class sc_method_process;
00130     friend class sc_thread_process;
00131     friend void sc_thread_cor_fn( void* arg );
00132 
00133 public:
00134     sc_event_list( const sc_event_list& );
00135     sc_event_list& operator = ( const sc_event_list& );
00136 
00137     int size() const;
00138     bool empty() const
00139       { return size() == 0; }
00140 
00141 protected:
00142 
00143     void push_back( const sc_event& );
00144     void push_back( const sc_event_list& );
00145 
00146     explicit
00147     sc_event_list( bool and_list_, bool auto_delete_ = false );
00148 
00149     sc_event_list( const sc_event&,
00150                    bool and_list_,
00151                    bool auto_delete_ = false );
00152 
00153     ~sc_event_list();
00154 
00155     void swap( sc_event_list& );
00156     void move_from( const sc_event_list& );
00157 
00158     bool and_list() const;
00159 
00160     void add_dynamic( sc_method_handle ) const;
00161     void add_dynamic( sc_thread_handle ) const;
00162     void remove_dynamic( sc_method_handle, const sc_event* ) const;
00163     void remove_dynamic( sc_thread_handle, const sc_event* ) const;
00164 
00165     bool busy()        const;
00166     bool temporary()   const;
00167     void auto_delete() const;
00168 
00169     void report_premature_destruction() const;
00170     void report_invalid_modification()  const;
00171 
00172 private:
00173 
00174     std::vector<const sc_event*> m_events;
00175     bool                         m_and_list;
00176     bool                         m_auto_delete;
00177     mutable unsigned             m_busy;
00178 };

00248 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------

00254 class SC_API sc_event
00255 {
00256     friend class sc_event_list;
00257     friend class sc_event_timed;
00258     friend class sc_simcontext;
00259     friend class sc_object;
00260     friend class sc_process_b;
00261     friend class sc_process_handle;
00262     friend class sc_method_process;
00263     friend class sc_thread_process;
00264     friend void sc_thread_cor_fn( void* arg );
00265     friend class sc_clock;
00266     friend class sc_event_queue;
00267     friend class sc_signal_channel;
00268     template<typename IF> friend class sc_fifo;
00269     friend class sc_semaphore;
00270     friend class sc_mutex;
00271     friend class sc_join;
00272     friend class sc_trace_file;
00273 
00274 public:
00275 
00276     sc_event();
00277     explicit sc_event( const char* name );
00278     ~sc_event();
00279 
00280     void cancel();
00281 
00282     const char* name() const             { return m_name.c_str(); }
00283     const char* basename() const;
00284     sc_object* get_parent_object() const { return m_parent_p; }
00285     bool in_hierarchy() const            { return m_name.length() != 0; }
00286 
00287     void notify();
00288     void notify( const sc_time& );
00289     void notify( double, sc_time_unit );
00290 
00291     void notify_delayed();
00292     void notify_delayed( const sc_time& );
00293     void notify_delayed( double, sc_time_unit );
00294 
00295     sc_event_or_expr  operator | ( const sc_event& ) const; 
00296     sc_event_or_expr  operator | ( const sc_event_or_list& ) const;
00297     sc_event_and_expr operator & ( const sc_event& ) const;
00298     sc_event_and_expr operator & ( const sc_event_and_list& ) const;
00299 
00300     // has this event been triggered in the current delta cycle?
00301     bool triggered() const;
00302 
00303     // never notified event
00304     static const sc_event none;
00305 
00306 private:
00307 
00308     void add_static( sc_method_handle ) const;
00309     void add_static( sc_thread_handle ) const;
00310     void add_dynamic( sc_method_handle ) const;
00311     void add_dynamic( sc_thread_handle ) const;
00312 
00313     void notify_internal( const sc_time& );
00314     void notify_next_delta();
00315 
00316     bool remove_static( sc_method_handle ) const;
00317     bool remove_static( sc_thread_handle ) const;
00318     bool remove_dynamic( sc_method_handle ) const;
00319     bool remove_dynamic( sc_thread_handle ) const;
00320 
00321     void register_event( const char* name, bool is_kernel_event = false );
00322     void reset();
00323 
00324     void trigger();
00325 
00326 private:
00327 
00328     enum notify_t { NONE, DELTA, TIMED };
00329 
00330     std::string     m_name;     // name of object.
00331     sc_object*      m_parent_p; // parent sc_object for this event.
00332     sc_simcontext*  m_simc;
00333     sc_dt::uint64   m_trigger_stamp; // delta of last trigger
00334     notify_t        m_notify_type;
00335     int             m_delta_event_index;
00336     sc_event_timed* m_timed;
00337 
00338     mutable std::vector<sc_method_handle> m_methods_static;
00339     mutable std::vector<sc_method_handle> m_methods_dynamic;
00340     mutable std::vector<sc_thread_handle> m_threads_static;
00341     mutable std::vector<sc_thread_handle> m_threads_dynamic;
00342 
00343 private:
00344     static struct kernel_tag {} kernel_event;
00345     explicit sc_event( kernel_tag, const char* name = NULL );
00346 
00347     // disabled
00348     sc_event( const sc_event& );
00349     sc_event& operator = ( const sc_event& );
00350 };

00352 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00353 //  CLASS : sc_event_timed
00354 //
00355 //  Class for storing the time to notify a timed event.
00356 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00357 
00358 class SC_API sc_event_timed
00359 {
00360     friend class sc_event;
00361     friend class sc_simcontext;
00362 
00363     friend SC_API int sc_notify_time_compare( const void*, const void* );
00364 
00365 private:
00366 
00367     sc_event_timed( sc_event* e, const sc_time& t )
00368         : m_event( e ), m_notify_time( t )
00369         {}
00370 
00371     ~sc_event_timed()
00372         { if( m_event != 0 ) { m_event->m_timed = 0; } }
00373 
00374     sc_event* event() const
00375         { return m_event; }
00376 
00377     const sc_time& notify_time() const
00378         { return m_notify_time; }
00379 
00380     static void* operator new( std::size_t )
00381         { return allocate(); }
00382 
00383     static void operator delete( void* p, std::size_t )
00384         { deallocate( p ); }
00385 
00386 private:
00387 
00388     // dedicated memory management
00389     static void* allocate();
00390     static void  deallocate( void* );
00391 
00392 private:
00393 
00394     sc_event* m_event;
00395     sc_time   m_notify_time;
00396 
00397 private:
00398 
00399     // disabled
00400     sc_event_timed();
00401     sc_event_timed( const sc_event_timed& );
00402     sc_event_timed& operator = ( const sc_event_timed& );
00403 };

00406 // IIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII
00407 
00408 inline
00409 void
00410 sc_event::notify( double v, sc_time_unit tu )
00411 {
00412     notify( sc_time( v, tu, m_simc ) );
00413 }
00414 
00415 
00416 inline
00417 void
00418 sc_event::notify_internal( const sc_time& t )
00419 {
00420     if( t == SC_ZERO_TIME ) {
00421         // add this event to the delta events set
00422         m_delta_event_index = m_simc->add_delta_event( this );
00423         m_notify_type = DELTA;
00424     } else {
00425         sc_event_timed* et =
00426                 new sc_event_timed( this, m_simc->time_stamp() + t );
00427         m_simc->add_timed_event( et );
00428         m_timed = et;
00429         m_notify_type = TIMED;
00430     }
00431 }
00432 
00433 inline
00434 void
00435 sc_event::notify_next_delta()
00436 {
00437     if( m_notify_type != NONE ) {
00438         SC_REPORT_ERROR( SC_ID_NOTIFY_DELAYED_, 0 );
00439     }
00440     // add this event to the delta events set
00441     m_delta_event_index = m_simc->add_delta_event( this );
00442     m_notify_type = DELTA;
00443 }
00444 
00445 inline
00446 void
00447 sc_event::notify_delayed( double v, sc_time_unit tu )
00448 {
00449     notify_delayed( sc_time( v, tu, m_simc ) );
00450 }
00451

00491 // IIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII
00492 
00493 inline
00494 sc_event_list::sc_event_list( bool and_list_, bool auto_delete_ ) 
00495   : m_events() 
00496   , m_and_list( and_list_ ) 
00497   , m_auto_delete( auto_delete_ ) 
00498   , m_busy( 0 )
00499 {
00500 }
00501 
00502 inline
00503 sc_event_list::sc_event_list( const sc_event& e,
00504                               bool and_list_,
00505                               bool auto_delete_ )
00506   : m_events()
00507   , m_and_list( and_list_ )
00508   , m_auto_delete( auto_delete_ )
00509   , m_busy(0)
00510 {
00511     m_events.push_back( &e );
00512 }
00513 
00514 inline
00515 sc_event_list::sc_event_list( sc_event_list const & that )
00516   : m_events()
00517   , m_and_list( that.m_and_list )
00518   , m_auto_delete( false )
00519   , m_busy( 0 )
00520 {
00521     move_from( that );
00522     that.auto_delete(); // free automatic lists
00523 }
00524 
00525 inline
00526 sc_event_list&
00527 sc_event_list::operator=( sc_event_list const & that )
00528 {
00529     if( m_busy )
00530         report_invalid_modification();
00531 
00532     if( SC_LIKELY_(this != &that) ) {
00533         move_from( that );
00534         that.auto_delete(); // free automatic lists
00535     }
00536 
00537     return *this;
00538 }
00539 
00540 inline
00541 sc_event_list::~sc_event_list()
00542 {
00543     if( m_busy )
00544         report_premature_destruction();
00545 }
00546 
00547 inline
00548 void
00549 sc_event_list::swap( sc_event_list& that )
00550 {
00551     if( busy() || that.busy() )
00552         report_invalid_modification();
00553     m_events.swap( that.m_events );
00554 }
00555 
00556 inline
00557 void
00558 sc_event_list::move_from( sc_event_list const&  that )
00559 {
00560     if( that.temporary() ) {
00561         swap( const_cast<sc_event_list&>(that) ); // move from source
00562     } else {
00563         m_events = that.m_events;                 // copy from source
00564     }
00565 }
00566 
00567 inline
00568 int
00569 sc_event_list::size() const
00570 {
00571     return static_cast<int>(m_events.size());
00572 }
00573 
00574 inline
00575 bool
00576 sc_event_list::and_list() const
00577 {
00578     return m_and_list;
00579 }
00580 
00581 
00582 inline
00583 bool
00584 sc_event_list::busy() const
00585 {
00586     return m_busy != 0;
00587 }
00588 
00589 
00590 inline
00591 bool
00592 sc_event_list::temporary() const
00593 {
00594     return m_auto_delete && ! m_busy;
00595 }
00596 
00597 inline
00598 void
00599 sc_event_list::auto_delete() const
00600 {
00601     if( m_busy ) {
00602         --m_busy;
00603     }
00604     if( ! m_busy && m_auto_delete ) {
00605         delete this;
00606     }
00607 }
00608

00749 inline
00750 sc_event_and_list&
00751 sc_event_and_list::operator &= ( const sc_event& e )
00752 {
00753     if( busy() )
00754         report_invalid_modification();
00755 
00756     push_back( e );
00757     return *this;
00758 }
00759 
00760 inline
00761 sc_event_and_list&
00762 sc_event_and_list::operator &= ( const sc_event_and_list& el )
00763 {
00764     if( busy() )
00765         report_invalid_modification();
00766 
00767     push_back( el );
00768     return *this;
00769 }
00770

00772 sc_event_and_expr
00773 sc_event_and_list::operator & ( const sc_event& e )
00774 {
00775     sc_event_and_expr expr;
00776     expr.push_back( *this );
00777     expr.push_back( e );
00778     return expr;
00779 }
